scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.start: npm run build-only && npx parcel serve src/index.html -d docs
scripts.build: npm run clean  && npm run build-only && export NODE_ENV=production && node --max-old-space-size=5000 node_modules/parcel/bin/cli.js build src/index.html -d docs --no-content-hash --detailed-report --no-source-maps --public-url './' && rm -rf ../../demos/docs/magica/playground && mkdir -p ../../demos/docs/magica/playground &&  mv docs/* ../../demos/docs/magica/playground/
scripts.build-only: P=$PWD &&  cd ../apps/magica-examples && npm run build && cd "$P/.." && npm run build && cd $P && npx tsc && npm run copy
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build
